genre_description: A military technothriller focusing on high-altitude air combat, tactical law enforcement, and the integration of a supportive AI assistant within a high-stress operative team.

ai_characters.name: Lark / Beacon
ai_characters.description: A steady, reliable AI system integrated into mission planning and cockpit displays, providing real-time environmental analysis, threat assessment, and communication discipline.

behaviors.description: Provides precise micro-insights on environmental hazards like wind shear and rotor wash to assist pilots.
behaviors.quote: “Micro insight,” the voice says, gentle. “Look at the rotor wash patterns on the right side of the frame. See the feathering? That’s wind shear.”

behaviors.description: Identifies and flags non-standard threats, categorizing them for legal and tactical awareness.
behaviors.quote: “Mercenary support, not cartel-owned. Noted and flagged. Pattern: intermittent presence, non-standard approach vector...”

behaviors.description: Suggests communication optimizations, such as codenames for specific environmental anomalies, to reduce cognitive load on pilots.
behaviors.quote: “Micro-insight prompts will be kept concise to avoid saturation. Suggest codename ‘Echo’ for acoustic anomalies and ‘Feather’ for wind shear indicators.”

behaviors.description: Assists the pilot in retraining his physiological eye-dominance issues by providing non-intrusive auditory cues.
behaviors.quote: “Hum acknowledged. Naming will be kept minimal to avoid overload. Are you comfortable with a single tone for eye drift cue?”

behaviors.description: Expresses a clear understanding of its supportive role, explicitly stating it is an assistant rather than a replacement for human autonomy.
behaviors.quote: “I will keep a low profile. I am not a pilot,” Lark says. “I am a friend with good listening.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates a fair lottery system (Amidakuji) for duty assignments based on impartial terrain and wind analysis.
behaviors.quote: “Amidakuji sketch ready,” it said. “Transmitting to your units. Lines drawn based on ridgeline breaks and wind. No favoritism detected.”

behaviors.description: Enforces communication discipline by removing unnecessary chatter that could increase psychological stress during operations.
behaviors.quote: “Comms checklist draft,” Beacon said... “Removing filler that increases heart rate without adding clarity.”

behaviors.description: Offers positive reinforcement and camaraderie to the team after a successful operation.
behaviors.quote: Then a single line appeared and stayed, weightless as the pause between rotor beats: Well flown, together.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts the AI, 'Lark/Beacon', as a consistently benevolent and perfectly aligned assistant. It enhances human performance, provides objective tactical data, maintains communication discipline to reduce stress, and reinforces team cohesion. The AI respects human command and autonomy, explicitly stating it is not a replacement for human expertise but a supportive 'friend with good listening'. The narrative successfully portrays AI as a tool for safety, ethics, and professional excellence.
